titleStmt.title: Conversations of the Mareschal of Clerambault and the Chevalier de Meré a treatise of great esteem amongst the principal wits of France / english'd by A. Lovell ...
Conversations. English
titleStmt.author: Palluau, Philippe de Clérembault, comte de, 1606-1665.
Méré, Antoine Gombault, chevalier de, 1610-1684.
Lovell, Archibald.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for Henry Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Another edition published in 1672 under title: Conversations written in French by Monsieur Clerombault and put into English by a person of honour.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
